sets.tps: 0 HP, 12 En, 8 M Def, 200 R Atk, 200 Sp
sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed with Nimble outspeeds Nimble Vesperatu and below 
 12 Energy = 290 Energy at level 50 for (4 Gamma Pulses + 1 Air Blade + 2 Peace of Minds) 
 80 HP and 8 Melee Defense are leftovers and the HP is odd for Icicle Traps
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 80 HP, 12 En, 8 M Def, 200 R Atk, 200 Sp
sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed with Nimble and Specialty Boots outspeeds Nimble Boots Phagenaut, without Nimble, outspeeds Boots Smart Phagenaut 
 80 HP and 8 Melee Defense are leftovers and the HP is odd for Icicle Traps 
 12 Energy = 290 Energy at level 50 for (4 Gamma Pulses + 1 Air Blade + 1 Barter)
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 192 HP, 12 En, 96 M Def, 200 Sp / 200 HP, 88 M Def
sets.detail:
192 HP is to be as bulky as possible while having odd HP for Icicle Traps (Use if not Health Amulet) 
 200 HP is to be as bulky as possible and gain 11 HP from Health Amulet every turn (Use if Health Amulet) 
 96/88 Melee Defense adding to the overall bulk 
 200 Speed with Nimble outspeeds Nimble Vesperatu 
 12 Energy = 290 Energy at level 50 for (5 Flash â€˜n Flees + 1 Air Blade)
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
